text: Joe McGinniss, Sr. (December 9, 1942 â€“ March 10, 2014) was an American author. He wrote many books about politician such as Richard Nixon, Ronald Reagan, Sarah Palin, and Barack Obama. McGinniss was born in New York City. He studied at College of the Holy Cross. McGinniss died in Worcester, Massachusetts from prostate cancer, aged 71.Joe McGinniss, Fatal Vision author, dies at age 71 at CBC.ca; published March 10, 2014; retrieved March 10, 2014 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Massachusetts Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:American journalists Category:Writers from New York City
